entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
